content: As far as I understood, the "[Base]/Patient/$everything?_count=1000" would return 1000 resources. Is there any way to fetch everything for only 1000 patients?
For servers that support the "bulkdata" spec, you can $export data that relates to a group of patients https://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/export/index.html#endpoint---group-of-patients
Mohsen Jafari has marked this topic as resolved.
